issues.description: Redundant title "FLIPPERHUB" below logo banner creates visual clutter
issues.recommendation: Remove the main title "FLIPPERHUB" below the logo banner

issues.description: Insufficient vertical spacing between password input and "Remember me" checkbox
issues.recommendation: Increase vertical spacing between password input and "Remember me" checkbox

issues.description: Input labels "USERNAME OR EMAIL" and "PASSWORD" are in uppercase but font size is too small for readability
issues.recommendation: Increase font size of input labels to match main title's readability

issues.description: "Remember me" checkbox and "Forgot password?" link are misaligned (checkbox left, link right)
issues.recommendation: Align both elements to the left or right consistently

issues.description: Input labels lack differentiation (both uppercase), reducing clarity
issues.recommendation: Use bold font for labels or differentiate with color

issues.description: Insufficient vertical spacing between "Remember me" checkbox and login button
issues.recommendation: Increase vertical spacing between checkbox and login button

issues.description: Subtitle "Tournament Management System" is too small, reducing visual hierarchy
issues.recommendation: Increase font size of subtitle to match main title's hierarchy

issues.description: Logo banner dominates page, reducing focus on login form
issues.recommendation: Reduce logo banner size or adjust spacing to prioritize login form

issues.description: Input labels do not clearly indicate purpose, reducing user understanding
issues.recommendation: Use bold font for labels or differentiate with color

Home::desktop.summary: Login page has redundant title, inconsistent spacing, and unclear typography that reduces usability. Visual hierarchy and layout need refinement for better user experience.
